评论详情: I love this dress. Wish I could have every color! Great fit, beautiful blue color.

评论概述: Love it. Great material. Flattering cut.
评论详情: Color didn’t do it for me but love everything else. Quality thick material with stretch. Getting in red for next Christmas.

This is a beautiful dress that looks gorgeous on. Even flattering on this woman with a tummy and curves. I ended up sending back the large and ordering the medium. Lots of compliments on this dress beautiful comfortable and flowy - it’s a win-win.

This is absolutely one of my favorite Amazon purchases of all time. I have the dress in two colors -- orange and brown -- size large. It is comfortable beyond words. It doesn't look or feel like a cheap dress. You can dress it up or down -- looks great with boots. No regrets.
I bought this dress for family photos and it was super flattering. I love the material. I bought an extra large and it fit me perfectly. It is true to size.
I’m 5’11 with 1.5 heels wearing an XL. Very plush thick material. Perfect dress for my son’s engagement party.
Comfortable, beautiful, and - importantly- not too long for me at 5’2!
I ordered the pink and it’s beautiful!  I’m 5’7”, 145 lbs and I ordered a small.  It fit perfect.  I’m about to order another color!

评论概述: True to size, true to photos
评论详情: I love this dress! The color is vibrant and it fits true to size. It's long and I love it. It's going to be a new staple in my wardrobe for sure.

评论概述: Soft, beautiful drape, gorgeous color!! My new favorite dress!
评论详情: This dress is gorgeous! Looks great with boots, the fabric is so soft and pretty. The teal is a deep true teal, shimmers in the light, and the dress is so comfy to wear that now I want 6 of them!

I purchased this as a bridesmaids dress in a friends wedding and have already worn it to two other events! It’s a very practical and flattering fit! Highly reccomend! Plus it’s such a beautiful and elegant looking material

Perfect fall/holiday season dress. Versatile for work, family & events. Each time I've worn this dress, I've received compliments from strangers about how pretty it is. This dress allows you to look dressed up while remaining completely comfortable!
I had to return just because the fabric was so uncomfortably heavy. It’s a shame bc it was really pretty.
Love the color

I love the color and fabric of this dress. Very comfortable and easy to dress up or down. The fabric is very stretchy and since it runs a bit large, I felt like it just hung there. I am not super curvy so if you are, this is a perfect dress for you. It’s very very comfortable. But if you are on the thinner or no curves side, probably pass on this one. The material is a great quality and well made. I don’t think that it would keep you warm, but it is thick enough that you wouldn’t need anything under it in the fall.
Love the crushed velvet. The burnt Orange color is just beautiful. I got the medium and even fit this tall girl!
I don’t wear dresses often but I got many compliments on this dress from strangers!
It fits perfect , I ordered another color right away
I completely love this dress!!! The color is true. The fit is perfect!! The design and quality is on point!!!!!
It was a blue not green dress
Loved it.
Beautiful dress with pretty lines.  Fits true to size.  Sleeves are short, so a light sweater helps with winter wear.  Mid calf length.
Great quality and fit, perhaps a bit long for me at 5’3, but was still flattering.
I never thought I could wear this and I've gotten more compliments than ever! I'm a strong, boxy shape at 149 pound size 8 and I feel glamorous!
Dress falls at the perfect length for fall/winter. Color was darker than expected but still beautiful.
Fit is perfect and the quality is good. I can't wait to wear it to a party.
Absolutely beautiful! I received so many compliments, it’s light, curves in all the right places!
Fits great, and looks great, flowy and so comfortable.

At 5'3" it's not always easy to find a long dress. This one ended up being perfect! I bought it for a wedding and thought it might be too casual but I'd rather be underdressed then over dressed. I paired it with a 5 inch gold block heel strappy sandal. I ended up with all of the compliments. The weight and thickness of the material makes you feel like it might be hot but even in the summer Utah heat I was fine. It's flowy enough to move air and also very flattering.
This is a very well made dress and seems to be true to size.
Beautiful color and comfy fit

As a plus size woman, this dress was very flattering. Made me look slimmer. The quality was very high for the price I paid and I got a compliment from almost everyone at my company party. Definitely a show stopper.
I receive countless compliments when I wore this the other day. It’s a beautiful color and it’s so comfy.
I wore this for a wedding, and it was so comfortable and flattering! I was a few months postpartum, and I really loved how this made me look and feel.
Very pretty; however, there is so much static! I should have known better based on the product fabric; but I had high hopes. If you don't mind static, then this is for you!
Loved the texture, length, and softness! I wish I would have sized down
Good weight, high quality. Got the dark blue and it’s gorgeous. Planning to wear it for the holidays. So happy with this purchase.

评论概述: Unless you want to be complimented constantly
评论详情: Do not buy this dress Unless you want to be complimented constantly!!!! Comfy, good length, the neck is not too low.
This is such a beautiful dress and fits just right!

This dress is comfortable and fits your body well. It’s cut straighter so it doesn’t look huge. I’d recommend 100% and I’m very picky. Packs well in a suitcase annd no wrinkles. Length is annkle length for me and I’m 5’7. Neckline not to low. Only drawback is how the material is attracted to lint. Be careful of any wrap or coat you wear over it as the fibers can stick to the dress. Just have a lint roller in hand.

I wore this dress to a fall wedding and it was gorgeous! I got a lot of compliments on it. This was supposed to be Hazel blue but it was darker than expected, which was fine with me. It is stitched in the V, which made it rather modest. I took out about 4 stitches and the V end down to the high waist line. I did come back up and pin it so it didn’t show my bra. It was very flowy and had good stretch. I am a 14-16 and it was great but I think someone could wear the XL up to an 18-20. I would highly recommend this dress!

Received my dress today and tried it on right away.  The fit and length were both perfect which is awesome.  Usually I have to do some adjusting it was perfect in all ways.  The color, fabric, and sewing was perfect.  Well worth the price.  Love it!

I absolutely love this dress, It is flattering and comfortable. The velvet is so pretty, I like theway it has a bit of variation in the darkness of colors. The rust brown was so beautiful for my niece's Fall wedding . ( I would call it more of a burnt orange) I am 5'6" and 132 lbs. I got the Medium and it fits perfectly, It does get a good amount of static, so a can of Static guard is good to have on hand. I love it so much at this price, I ordered another color.
Did not like material or color on me

LOVE the orange crushed velvet! Very happy with the length & the fit. The opening in front is secured in just the right place. I wear a size 6 dress so I got a small & the fit is perfect. I have broader shoulders which sometimes puts me in a medium. Glad I did a small the medium would have been too big in the waist. The fabric is thicker so the dress lays & flows nicely. The length is perfect. I'm 5'6  I wore tall boots the hem hit just above my ankle bone. This is a dupe of the Anthro Somerset velvet Maxi but they didn't have the orange color. Lots of compliments.

评论概述: Great for the Price! Almost perfect
评论详情: I’m a 16, bought a large (Amazon size recommendation) and it fit great! Very flattering. And XL would have been too much fabric for me. Just like all the other reviews say, the fabric is good quality with a nice weight to it,  the construction is done well. The color is rich and beautiful. The dark green is REALLY dark and deep. It’s beautiful. The ONLY thing that would make this dress absolutely perfect is… pockets. I wish it had pockets BUT I will still wear it a lot regardless and would purchase more anyway
Very uncomfortable
Love these dresses, exactly like Anthropologie

This is so soft, and comfortable! I got tons of comments (not like I was fishing for them, but still. I recommend this product. I order a large and it was perfect, I’m 5’4” and wear a size 14 normally.

评论概述: Very large for its size, just ok dress
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress but it looks so much better in the pictures.  It comes really large as well.  I normally wear a large but got a medium in this and it is still a bit large, so definitely size down.  The color is so much darker than in the pics as well.  The fit is ok, not fantastic.

评论概述: I don’t want to take it off!
评论详情: I got so many compliments when I wore this dress the first time! The color is GORGEOUS!  Not kidding, computer strangers stopped me to compliment the dress. The quality is great, the length and weight are great. It is super comfortable. Can’t say enough good things about this purchase!

评论概述: Different colors fit different, not as long as pictured
评论详情: I bought the gold & the green both in small; returned the gold (ran HUGE), and kept the green, which fit better, but still needs to be belted. Loose thru the waist (elastic wasitband has no tension), would work better on thicc girls.  Not as long as pictured, but decently well-made for the price. Runs large.  Keeping because I like to lounge around the house in velvet, but I don't like it enough to wear out for a date night.
Wonderful dress but a little shorter and tighter in the bust

The material is high quality and it looks very nice. I receive compliments every time I wear it. Has stretch and is very comfortable. The only thing missing is pockets. The material is warm and the dress is flows nicely and flattering.
Love this fabric so much.  Versatile and washes nicely.  Color is gorgeous.

I’m a curvy small and I feel like because it’s super heavy, it stretches the smocked part and isn’t super flattering on my waist. I may take it in on the sides. Going to wear it to a west tx wedding in December with turquoise, it should be cute!
I love this dress but I’m only 5’3 and it’s a long dress on me. The extra length in this fabric is heavy to wear and pulls down on the elastic waist. I think I’d be tugging at it too frequently.

This dress is gorgeous! The color is spot on and the fabric is nice. Per other reviews I ordered a size down from what I normally would, and it fits perfectly. The only issue with it is the dart for the neckline is in a weird place, so there is a gap between my cleavage that I will need to sew up.
I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments. Very pretty dress. True to size.

I have been eyeing this dress from another brand (mall brand - Somerset velvet maxi) this is a perfect match! I ordered a medium and the fit is perfect - this is for a fall wedding. I couldn’t be happier. I’m 5’8 and 160. Medium is ideal.

What I like:  The dress has a heavier weight (not skimpy) which drapes nicely, a style that flatters the bust, waist and hip for most weight types, easy care, has just the right amount of stretch, and rich color choices.  Short sleeves are a flutter style that is very feminine.  I paired it with a modern print shawl/pashmina type on a cooler day.  Got several compliments.  I bought a few more in different colors because good velvet/velour dresses aren't offered all the time in fashion cycles.  Would also look fun dressed down with a pair of boots and the right accessories.  Bought size L (US 12-14 is what I normally wear).  Am 5' 8".

This dress is 99% what I was hoping it would be. Only issue is the color is very dark and slightly more teal color than the picture shows. But otherwise it's gorgeous! It fits perfect and is not too long. I'm 5'5" / 230 and bought an XL. The fabric is heavier weighted like I was hoping (not cheap and thin) so I will be warmer at a fall wedding I bought it for. I love it!
My lady wanted this dress to wear for church in the winter. It fits beautifully, true to size and the fabric is top quality.

This dress is so well made. The fabric is beautiful and so soft and good quality. It even has some stretch in it. It is sewn very well. The fit is so flattering and slimming. I think it could be dressed up or down. The color haze blue was disappointing. It is not at all like pictured. It must have been photographed with a flash camera. It is a dark blue, like a navy with a greenish undertone. A murky fog color. I know they knew that this photograph wasn't representative, so I take a star off for that.
It’s a beautiful dress, super soft and flattering. I followed the sizing and got a large, but I wish I got a medium because it’s just a little big. Too late to exchange it, just got it for a wedding
We are headed to an Eras Tour show. This will be a dress for my daughter. She loved it. Fit perfect, great fabric.
It’s pretty.  It’s dressy. It’s soft.  It’s stretchy.  It’s comfortable.  No wrinkling!  Well made. True to size. I loved it so much I bought every color!!
Color was absolutely stunning for photos! Just beautiful and fit perfect
Beautiful dress, as pictured. The color is true to the photos and the material is nice heavy and well-made. Worth the money. Will buy again in different colors.

Curvy girls, listen up! This is my FAVORITE DRESS EVER and I am so sad I can only wear it in the winter.  It flatters the curves, flows well, and doesn't ruin in the wash.  I wish I could rate this a 6/5 because it deserves it.  Have your cute cocktail or winter moment in this dress, ladies, it was made for you.

Too many times, dresses are toooo long for those of us in the 5 foot range.  This one hits at my ankles.  It's cute with a jean jacket or without.  It's soft and skims over the lady lumps I love to hide.  I love this dress and found it well worth buying.
The dress was so lovely but wrong for my body type and the color I chose was not flattering for my age or hair color. But that was my fault in choosing color but for others may be a perfect dress.

I ordered the Hazelblue dress (light blue), but was sent the dark blue. Returned it and ordered the same color dress again… and got another dark blue. Disappointed about it not being the right color as I needed the light blue for a wedding. Otherwise, it’s a comfy and flattering dress.

I really love this dress! The only reason I docked a star was because it has a weird design with the bust area being sewed only at the very top leaving a big opening for the boobs to show. I know how to sew so it was easy for me to fix and it looks just as it should now! I don’t understand why they would cut a corner like that? But i love it now that the girls are covered properly lol. The material and color is lovely and super comfy! I got lots of compliments!

This dress is beautiful and can This dress is beautiful and can be dressed up or worn casually. The dress is soft, flattering and comfortable. I bought this dress in several colors for winter. The color was slightly darker in person; I love it!

I don't think I've ever had a dress that I love as much as this one. It is so flattering and I always get complements when I wear it. The fit is perfect. I am 5' 3" and 163 lbs. I ordered a size small. I normally wear medium, but ordered a small at my sister's recommendation since she'd already ordered a similar dress. I think the top would have been too large if I'd ordered a medium since I am small busted. I did sew a line of stitching along the front neckline seam because I didn't like it as low as it was.

I looked at a lot of velvet dresses before I finally made my decision and I believe this one gave me the most value for my money. The quality is there Super comfortable The color is amazing and just like it was displayed on line. I am very pleased with this dress
I love this dress. So comfortable and beautiful.

评论概述: Beautiful material but sizing is ehhhh
评论详情: I bought an extra large XL and I am 5 foot five 170-ish. I wanted a loose fitting, long flowing maxi dress for a Stevie Nicks concert I was attending. The material was absolutely gorgeous-gold crushed velvet. But the fit is way off. I wound up wearing something else to the concert and will need to get this dress tailored if I’m going to wear it. I love the length of the dress, but it is way too big in the waist. too bad the waist did not have a little hidden drawstring. That would’ve been perfect. And I didn’t want to pull this tight and cinch in my waistline. I just anted it to not be massively big. With this particular seller, returning the dress was not easy, so I kept it. Still haven’t worn the dress yet, but do plan to have it altered or maybe pin it and just wear a jacket with it or something.
Very nice dress is well made. Did wash in garmet bag in dental with cold water and softener turned out wonderful and hung dry.
This dress is so gorgeous. The fabric is heavy and feels and looks like a quality garment. It is so flattering and hangs perfectly.
I really love this dress! I am 147lbs at 5'3" and a dd. I do feel that if you hv a small chest size it won't look right.

评论概述: Dressed up and completely comfortable! A win!
评论详情: I wore this dress in red to a Valentine’s Day event and got a lot of compliments. The fabric is awesome for this price point. I was surprised! It’s a great Anthro somerset dress dupe! Size down as it runs big.

I meant to return this, but forgot to do it in time. This is a big, chunky dress that is just simply unattractive. The neck line is too low, and the fabric looks cheap in person. It's going to Goodwill so hopefully it can find a good home!
Perfect fit , Beautiful color , Compliments galore . Very Comfortable.

评论概述: A great dress for a great price!
评论详情: This dress is so comfortable! The color is a bit darker in person but not bad. Order true to size
I bought this is a rust color for Thanksgiving. I loved the fit so much that I bought the raspberry color for Christmas. Lol

I ordered a medium and the tag says 8/10. After reading reviews and details I decided on a medium as it's a pull over. I am 5'4 150lbs. It is too big. I should have gone with a small but typically I am more M/L. The cut makes it lay where it would cover more of the midsection if that's a problem area . The material is very heavy and I think adds to it feeling too big. There is lots of stretch. Quality looks nice. I did order dark green and it's almost black. Not as green as the picture but I think that really depends on the lighting as well given it's velvet. A conservative look but think it can be made sexy with the right accessories. For the price I would recommend and order again.
Very beautiful and elegant. I loved that it was heavy-weight, it's perfect for winter.
Can’t beat the price for the product. Looks exactly like in photos!
Usually I have poor success with buying clothes from Amazon but this was the exception! I love this dress!
I bought this dress to wear to my daughter's bridal shower. It was beautiful! The perfect color of pink, fit true to size, and was very comfortable. Very happy with my purchase.

The dress is comfortable and pretty! I ordered this dress for maternity pictures. I will be returning it as it appears much darker than the advertised picture of it. Just wasn’t the color I was looking for! But it is a pretty dress.

I am 5 2 and 150 lbs. I’m usually a medium but since I’m short I order dresses in a small. It fit perfectly and the length was perfect. I could have even probably went with the extra small. Nice fabric, stretchy, good quality.

Bought this dress for my daughter who is speaking at a public event. Does not look too mature ( although we are going to add a button to the neck). Gorgeous feel and fabric with beautiful rich color. Glad we picked this one.

评论概述: Nice dress but doesn’t match the photo
评论详情: I like this brand and already ordered two dresses. The photo though is not properly describing what this item. The dress is much shorter and the green is so dark it’s almost black.
Very happy with this purchase, good fit and love the color
Granddaughter says she loves how it fits
I want to wear this for various events where I need to be comfy and look festive. I love it and may order another color soon. It is so cute

评论概述: The Perfect Dress for a Perfect Event
评论详情: This dress is absolutely beautiful. It was a perfect, soft, and feminine dress. Just beautiful. It’s one of those dresses that you can dress it up or make it casual. I’m going to purchase in more colors. Thanks
